byline.contributor: Al Baker and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ELI ROSENBERG and NATE SCHWEBER

abstract: Queens imam Alauddin Akonjee and his assistant Thara Miah are fatally shot near their Ozone Park mosque; authorities say men were apparently targeted but do not specify motive; community members worry assailant was influenced by rising anti-Muslim sentiment.
lead_paragraph: The police said it appeared that the two men were targeted but did not release a motive for the shooting outside the Al-Furqan Jame Masjid mosque in the Ozone Park neighborhood.
snippet: The police said it appeared that the two men were targeted but did not release a motive for the shooting outside the Al-Furqan Jame Masjid mosque in the Ozone Park neighborhood....

headline.main: Imam and His Assistant Killed in a Shooting Near a Mosque in Queens
headline.print_headline: Imam and Assistant Are Killed in Shooting Near Mosque in Queens
